tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor performed Knee Replacement surgery for my Father in Law ( for both the legs ) and he recovered and walking without support in 3 weeks.
My Mother got confidence and same repeated to my mother with Gautam.  Knee Replacement happened on Apr 11 and operation was success.  She is recovering and thankful to doctor for his expertise, and the insertion of Knees which are different from outside market.  Knees replaced are 360 degrees flexible and with the less weight, where my mother and FIL are recovered very fast.  If some one planning for their parents, without any doubt go ahead and plan for surgery.  ** *** **** *** ******* ************ ****** ******* ** ** **** ** * ******************

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It is very late to show my gratitude to this doctor who performed my ACL reconstruction surgery on December 2016. I was bit anxious about the surgery and also got a best physiotherapy by Dr Alok he made sure I've started walking bending and getting back to football as early as possible which happened with 2 months

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Amazing doctor!!! listened me patiently, explained me the seriousness of the casualty; and assured me that everything will be okay soon. This is what I like the most about him.If a doctor can make a patient believe that it's just a normal issue, then half cure is already done.thanks so much Dr.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor was friendly *** ********* *** ********** We visited for my father in law because he fell down from stairs and was having pain near ribs and upper back. After taking X-Ray doctor Goutam confirmed that there was no fracture and provided medicines for pain. Since a dull pain was still there after 4-5 days,  we consulted our family doctor in our home town and he suggested to do a scan.. In the scan report it was clear that patient had hairline fracture on 4 ribs!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor helped me with initial attempt to remediate the problem. Later, once when the results were not progressed with medication, suggested the right specialist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I’m completely satisfied with the provided service. He really listens to his patients and comfort them with proper guidance. Didn’t ask me to spend bunch of money on unnecessary tests. Would definitely recommend him.

tags: None
review: Very good..He explained the things very well***** *****r,very helpful person..He is very frank,thanks to him..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr. Goutam is sincere and friendly, very patient and recommends **** *** **** treatment without resorting to unnecessary tests and procedures.

tags: Wait time,
review:
This was ny first visit and the Doctor just wrote some tests. I am fine with the fact that doctor would like to investigate first before prescribing, but he should explain atleast what his hypothesis is and what are each of these tests for- thats why i am paying him the consultation fee. 
However, the thing thats bad about the doctor is that he is always late, and doesn’t respect appointment time. I had 1.5 hour wait time for 10 minutes with the doctor

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: He is a very good doctor. He has done a knee replacement for my father. I am very much satisfied with his treatment
